SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

jam.global
Class JamProperties

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jam.global.JamProperties
public class JamProperties
extends java.lang.Object

This is an class that is used to get and set the properties for Jam. As the properties are loaded before a way to print out messages has been constructed we save the messages so they can be later retrieved. For config we try jam.home which if null we try DEFAULT_JAM_HOME For user we try user.home then jam.home then DEFAULT_JAM_HOME then Properties

  • jam.home
  • host.ip
  • host.IP=iotwo
  • host.portSend=5003
  • host.portRecv=5002
  • target.IP=calvin
  • target.port=5002
  • host-data.IP=iotwo-data
  • host-data.portRecv=10205
  • sort.path=/home/jam/sortfiles
  • sort.stream=jam.sort.L002InputStream
  • cnaf.path=/JAM/CAMAC/CNAFS
  • browser.path=netscape
  • docs.path=documentation
  • jam.home=/home/jam
  • log.path assumed to be jam.home if not given

Version:
0.5 1-17-99
Author:
Ken Swartz

EVENT_WRITER

public static final java.lang.String EVENT_WRITER
Property for determining whether Jam handles writing of event data (JAM), or if it communicates with the front end computer to delegate this task (FRONTEND). Possible values: JAM or FRONTEND
